A bridge between science and journalism

Find what scientists and experts are sharing on social medial, and discover facts that can take you to better stories



Check the web app

Enhanced discovery

Instead of following hundreds of new people at once and get lost in your news feed, we gathered in one place profiles and trends that can help your reporting. Our database includes over 500 profiles of experts, scientists, organizations and scientific initiatives.

Know more

The Science Pulse, in few words

Advanced filters

You can refine your search with specific parameters that easy to set and use.

New knowledge

The Pulse has its own set of analytic data to help better understand the scientific community.

It is free to use

Our goal is to support jornalists and journalism, but everyone is welcome.

This project

The Science Pulse is sponsored by the International Center for Journalists with support from the Knight Foundation, and was developed by the data-driven agency Volt Data Lab to help inform journalists around scientific topics, especially for the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.
